question:
Write a letter to your friend from a different country. Invite him/ her to a party at your home and include the following:
- what the party is about
- give directions how to get to your place
- suggest how to accommodate him/ her
text: I hope you are doing amazing.  I am pleased to invite you to my parent's 25th wedding anniversary party.

It has been so long to see you after  college is over.  On  December 10th , my family is planning to throw a surprise party for my parents on their anniversary.  We  are also planning to have a dress code of black and white clothes .It will be a different experience for you.

In fact,  we are left with just one week only.  So without any further delay try to book your air  tickets as soon as possible .  Even  try to get a direct flight from Thailand to Delhi.  It would be more convenient for you.  I will send a cab for you at the airport.

I would like to tell you to not worry about your accommodation.  I already had a talk with my uncle and aunt about your stay and they vacant a room for you.  It would be amazing to have you here with me.
Eagerly waiting to see you. Convey regards to your parents.
